website_summaries.verdict: A best pick for those in the market for a spray-style sunscreen for little ones.
pros: Users comment on how easy this product is to apply with its pump spray applicator and note it works well even on those with pale skin tones
We like that it can also work for sensitive skin and has a light floral scent
cons: Comes out thicker than mist-type sunscreens
Some said skin felt greasy or sticky after applying

customer_reviews.title: and works (even on my red-headed super pale Irish friends)
customer_reviews.text: I brought this when I went with a group to Hawaii, everyone brought all kinds of expensive sunscreen and everyone ended up using mine!! Not just for babies. Goes on light, not irritating, and works (even on my red-headed super pale Irish friends).
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but a good compromise
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use zinc oxide based sunscreen while kids really wanted spray type. This was a good compromise but not perfect. It is thin enough so it can be sprayed but will not be the mist spray like chemical sunscreen types. Looks like sunscreens based on zinc oxide as the only active ingredient would clog and not work well in spray type. Octinoxate, one of the chemical ingredient in this sunscreen, however is toxic for coral and is one of the main sea pollutants. Wish it could be better but this is what we settled for now.
customer_reviews.author: Grace K

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunscreen for Sensitive Skin!!
customer_reviews.text: Best non-allergenic sunscreen for daughter who is allergic to everything. Great for older children and adults, too. Goes on very smoothly and easy to rub in. Spent a full day at Magic Kingdom under the beating sun and never had to reapply - no indications of having been in the sun. Terrific product!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Babyganics
customer_reviews.text: Just like the regular tube of babyganics except much easier to rub in. I was hoping to love his product but when I brought it to vacation with me I noticed that I felt sticky and it didn’t seem to really do anything except sit on top of the skin. Forget even trying to go in the water with this on since all it does is show up super white and gets sort of clumpy looking. I was hoping it would be more like the Aveeno sunscreen I usually buy, but I can definitely say I’ll be sticking with Aveeno from now on. Now I’m not sure what to do since this order came wih two bottles..
customer_reviews.author: laurie phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works well and much safer than everything else out there.
customer_reviews.text: In searching for a sunscreen that didnt have all of the toxic chemicals, this was definitely my best find. I tried a few and this definitely stood true. It lasted longer than others. Reapplied after close to 2 hours and no redness on the little one. It does say 90 min, so I suggest that. 2 others I tried with similar ingredients (non toxic) both failed. One of the others should have been reapplied after an hour as we already saw redness. .. I resorted to this one and have loved it since. The bug spray also worked well. It was nice that it had the smell of essential oils which was so much nicer than the other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie H

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I foudn this on sale and have tried other products by this brand and liek them alot but I tried this product this year and do not find that it works. I prefere the blue lizard sun screen. I have put this on myself and my kids a few times and each time felt like it did nothing. We also put this on the 15 min prior to sun exposure and that does not help. I would not recomend this unless you want to reapply every 10 min. It is also a bit sticky when you put it on. Do noy buy!
customer_reviews.author: Schmitt6727

customer_reviews.title: This arrived in a very secured and nice packaging. A plus
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a very secured and nice packaging. A plus! You'll know at once that this came from a reputable company. I purchased this because my son loves to be in the pool always. The concept that this is a mineral lotion and wasn't an aerosol spray eased my concerns about respiratory risks. It is long lasting and effective but make sure to rub it thoroughly. however, this being a pump spray, you have to deal with the fact that you may not get all of the product in the container.
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaAlexander

customer_reviews.title: I can't find a good product for dogs so I just use baby sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for my boston dog. he loves to sit out in the sun so I need to put sunscreen on him. I can't find a good product for dogs so I just use baby sunscreen. I know I read that it is not good for them, but that just seems strange. If babies can use it why wouldn't a dog. He doesn't lick it so Im not sure how it could harm him.
customer_reviews.author: Grable52

customer_reviews.title: Best baby/sensitive skin sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Living on at the lake during the summer, I’ve tried multiple kiddo sunscreens and this is my favorite by far. With all the new research suggesting sunscreen is highly absorbed by the body, I feel better knowing I’m using a natural, mineral sunscreen. I simply spray this on my hands and then rub on my girls. You all know that kiddos hate cold sunscreen going on or you end up spraying them in the eyes! I also use this on my face because I have sensitive rosacea and I have no irritation with this product. No sunburns to date and both myself and my girls have had zero irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse practitioner by day - mommy by night

customer_reviews.title: First Time User of Brand
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this is my first negative review, ever. My 2 year old son broke out with the exact pimples shown in the pictures from others. It happened the same day after applying the sunscreen for the first time. Obviously, I tossed the newly purchased sunscreens in the trash and went on to read the reviews (yup, didn't read before I purchased because I thought I was buying a "trusted brand") and to my shock, there were a handful of similar issues. Hopefully a solution is in the works and resolved in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Great mineral-based sunscreen that applies easily
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen - sprays easily, spreads easily on skin, nice light rose scent (not overpowering), and lasts several hours. We apply in the AM before sending our kid to preschool, and the preschool teacher reapplies at noon, and thus far our LO's skin has remained baby soft and burn/tan free. Also love that it is physical sunscreen (as opposed to chemical), so I feel like this is a safe option for babies/toddlers. The bottle is also double-capped for travel purposes - if the outer cap comes off during travel, there is still the inner cap to protect the spray bottle from leaking sunscreen all over. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Leng Family

customer_reviews.title: the best protection without chemicals
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad we found these for our kids we use them as well, they spread on the skin very easily and provide great protection. We have not burned at all this entire summer so far. We also use it on our faces. It may be rater for kids but adults can use it too, our skin is the same. Another thing to note even though the SPF is high you will get dark but you won't burn.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Th

customer_reviews.title: Concerned.
customer_reviews.text: Ummm. Concerned about the consumer report about this sunscreen. SPF 10 in actuality?!
customer_reviews.author: S Long

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: One of them arrived damaged and exploded all over my kitchen. The bottom was cracked. Had to go through the hassle of sending it back to get a refund. What a huge pain. Plus the price is high. Used the other one and it wipes off so quickly and my daughter got fried. Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this brand
customer_reviews.text: The best! Before finding these, I was fighting with my toddler to smear thick sunscreen on her but this kind is quick and easy. The spray isn't a mist, it sprays the lotion out viscous enough to rub on, but not too thin that you're worries about babies breathing it in. So far no sunburns, either.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have to be very careful and avoid getting any sun but love the outdoors. I put this on my face and neck and chest every morning. Very nice consistency. Easy to use. I like the fact that it has a spray and then it’s more liquidy. I tell all my friends about this sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this one for my kids, and sometimes I use myself as well if I forget to put sunscreen before leaving the house. The only reason why I’m giving it 4 stars is because the spray splashed everywhere, I wish they had a pump instead. I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: _dayma_

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Today is the first day of our vacation and my son has a terrible reaction to the sunscreen. He has rash all over his upper body (because I forgot to put them on his legs), thus we are thinking its the sunscreen not something else gave him the rash. He has never had hives before. Now my husband and my son are off to hospital in Mexico and I have to stay in the hotel with my baby girl. Terrible terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Luo

customer_reviews.title: great product for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My one daughter has extremely sensitive skin and breaks out in a rash when basically anything touches her skin. This product is one of my favorites and the spray allows for a much more even layer than the squeeze bottles. Kid and mom approved!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney "Mother of Plants" Smith

customer_reviews.title: RECALLED
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it's too late for me to return this but they just announced that the product is on recall due to the toxic ingredient causing seizures or baby to pass out. Keep researching guys. I threw mine away and ended up going with Blue Lizard
customer_reviews.author: zoomlash

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults too
customer_reviews.text: I use this sunscreen on myself (no babies here) and I really like it. I'm out in the sun most days and this has done a great job of keeping my skin from burning. There really is no fragrance to it other than a slight smell from the ingredients. It's not anything bad or lingering.
customer_reviews.author: s.kittyCA

customer_reviews.title: Love Babyganics
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for a month now and have not had any issues. I love that it sprays and it’s pretty easy to run in. My son has never been directly placed in the sun without another protective measure: hat, blanket, umbrella... so I’m not sure 100% of the sun protection but he’s only 7 months old. So far I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JennS

customer_reviews.title: My kids are very sensitive. It sometimes create small pimples on face but body seems to be good!
customer_reviews.text: I like this design (spray well) and no smell. My kids are very sensitive. Bodies are good with all SPF50 but face. They sometimes have pimples after using but this product seems to be only often creating pimples. Not greasy, easy to use, non clog spray.
customer_reviews.author: Cosme Gal

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to spread
customer_reviews.text: It’s very light, easy to spray on and rub in, and most importantly, my little ones haven’t been burned by the sun and we do A LOT of outside play. It’s the only sunscreen I use on them (3.5 & 2 yrs old)
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen for my babies. I have tried a ton of different brands but always come back to this because I can trust that it will protect and it actually rubs in.
customer_reviews.author: Er

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spray on and rub in but the 2 times I used it on my daughter she got sunburned. We were swimming in the morning so maybe was just the time of day but we didn’t risk using it again after 2 sunburns. We applied and reapplied as directed but didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah w

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite sunscreen for my little one
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sunscreen for my little one. She has very sensitive skin and this has worked perfectly. It sprays on and rubs in very smoothly. Light and pleasant scent. We used this in the Dominican Republic in the winter, for long and very sunny park days in Disney this spring and then all summer long with LOTS of time spent outside and at the beach. My daughter has never gotten a sunburn and honestly she hardly has gotten a tan. Great sunscreen for the little ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: ... for adult use because it seemed to be the best available option that is environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for adult use because it seemed to be the best available option that is environmentally friendly. It worked extremely well in tropical climate in jungle, lake and beach settings. All users were very fair skinned. Purchased additional product for added face protection.
customer_reviews.author: Emesge27

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My babies have sensitive skin. Since I discovered this sunscreen I religiously buy it every year. It does the job, doesn’t irritate my babies’ skin. Doesn’t stain clothing, smells better than other brands. Lasts a long time. My babies are 6 and 4 now, still i buy only this brand for the whole family
customer_reviews.author: Luidmila K.

customer_reviews.title: Will keep on hand for next decades
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on the baby, myself, and my partner! I will be stocking this for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Chanjin

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using babyganics for years, but this is so easy to apply on without leaving white residue. So glad we tried it.
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: Not as safe as other leading brand sunscreens for kids.
customer_reviews.text: has some active ingredients that aren't recommended by all physicians for children. Spray works well and is easy to apply. I like it better for me than most other spray or lotion sunscreens, but I'm reluctant to use it with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: This product was not effective for us. Used it on 4 children, none of whom generally have sensitive skin. Reapplied every 80-90 minutes as directed. All were left with splotchy burned areas at the end of the day. Will not use again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squirmy toddler ease
customer_reviews.text: Quickly able to get sunscreen on my 17 MO. Doesn't affect his sensitive skin (he get rashes from bandaid adhesive). He has never had a sunburn and we live in South Florida. 2 pack is convenient as well to have one in the diaper bag and one in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware: contains phenoxyethanol
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Contains phenoxyethanol (a controversial preservative and I believe it’s banned already in EU). They need to innovate and improve on their formulations to stay competitive.
customer_reviews.author: worklifekids

customer_reviews.title: Smells very good, a light floral scent (not a chemical odor)
customer_reviews.text: Smells very good, a light floral scent (not a chemical odor). I love that it's a mineral block without endocrine disruptors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Potentially harmful chemicals
customer_reviews.text: My kids daycare warned me that there are harmful chemicals in this and they backed up their statement with a report that was written by a consumer on Facebook. I did like the product and did not have any issues with it personally but hearing that it is potentially harmful for my kids I decided to stay away from it. Better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all around
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for all ages. It lasts a long time, goes on easy, easy to wash off in the shower and works great.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Product as described, received product as promised, and great seller
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, received product as promised, and great seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My son has eczema and this works wonders for him. All of their products are like magic to mum like me 😊
customer_reviews.author: Katgotyourtongue

customer_reviews.title: Repurchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my HG mineral based body sunscreen,easy to spread and rub in,not greasy at all,leave a slight white cast which is actually a bonus for my fair Asian skin,smells sweet as honey though there is no fragrance in the ingredient list?Great protection as well.Unless I run into something better by chance otherwise I think I will keep on repurchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Most important, this sunscreen doesn’t sting the eyes. It has a rather light texture and dries quickly with little to no residue. It seems to offer great, long lasting protection. Thanks to Amelia, my niece, for giving me my first bottle.
customer_reviews.author: tlb

customer_reviews.title: Not Sunscreen spray.
customer_reviews.text: it is lotion that spray out. I still have to rub the lotion on my skin to make it apply evenly. It is not like the sunscreen spray of other brands. It is not easy to use when you have to rub it evenly all the time. Much more expensive than other sunscreen spray.
customer_reviews.author: Saika

customer_reviews.title: Smell made me sick; pump action not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Babyganics product I've purchased, and the second time I've been disappointed. The smell made me sick to my stomach. Granted, I am sensitive to the typical sunscreen chemical smell, but this was the same, if not worse!! I knew that it was only "mineral-based," but wanted the pump spray action for easy application on my children, so decided to give it a try. The pump action is nowhere near as convenient as the bad spray kind, so what's the point? I'm not going to use the rest of the product. I ended up grabbing some Alba Emollient from Whole Foods instead; EWG rate it a 2, it has no smell, and is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Only the best for my babies (and me too)
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this sunscreen several times. I like that it is safe for my kids and I even put it on myself. This sunscreen protected my babies well in Kauai. I prefer this spray applicator athough it's thick enough I just spray onto my hand and then lather on.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Used it for years...buy it every summer!
customer_reviews.text: We use the mineral-based sunscreen because some of the chemicals in other sunscreens react with our water (in the wash) and end up staining our clothes. I love the spray bottles...so much easier to apply to squirmy children. The lotion is thin enough to apply and rub in so it's not visible and is water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen!  Best I've found!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is the best! My kids never get sunburns. Pleasant smell. Not overly messy like other brands. The best I've found. I even use it on myself.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R Campione

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff. Use it on my grand kids when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff. Use it on my grand kids when they visit us at the beach. Worth the $$. Like this better than the same brand that comes in a squeeze tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best for health and environment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! THE best alternative to aerosol sprays. My son has asthma so we cannot use the aerosol, not to mention they are bad for the environment. Although, after discovering this pump, I would never go back to aerosol. It’s easy to spread, not cold on the skin and smells great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gambero

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I typically buy it at target. The price seemed significantly less then target. I like the pump that is used with this design You can pump the lotion right onto child then rub in. You don't have the spray in the air like other Spray sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: JaR

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen, crappy bottles
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, BUT the bottles are terrible: Pumps don't work (2 of 3). Instead on an open spray (more.mist like), it sprays in a straight shot.
customer_reviews.author: Ehuanochtli

customer_reviews.title: Love spray option and blends in skin well but still ...
customer_reviews.text: Love spray option and blends in skin well but still requires to be rubbed in FYI. Also like packaging to avoid leaks when keeping in diaper bag. No skin irritation issues
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Both bottle pumps stopped working halfway through the bottle. ...
customer_reviews.text: Both bottle pumps stopped working halfway through the bottle. Rubs in okay. Buy the regular sunscreen rather than the spray.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Not mineral sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: Not mineral sunscreen. No where on the bottle does it say "mineral" and the ingredients are very different from my other mineral sunscreens
customer_reviews.author: Jen beams

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far!! Bought for a boat. all other brands leave behind residue on the seats. So far this one doesn't do that
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lebeau

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what is in the picture
customer_reviews.text: We had wanted the type of bottle that is in the picture and we got the continuous spray bottles. This is false advertisement. You should provide the item that is pictured. We specifically bought this because we thought we were getting the pump bottle which actually lasts longer from our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Loribelle

customer_reviews.title: smells good, works like a magic veil against the tropical ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes on well, smells good, works like a magic veil against the tropical sun. My fair-skinned teen even loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherMcIntyre

customer_reviews.title: My kids looks like little ghosts after I put this stuff on
customer_reviews.text: An effective sunscreen, but my oh my is it white. My kids looks like little ghosts after I put this stuff on. It stays put (I guess that's a bonus because you can literally see it all over their faces.) Some nights I have to scrub it off in the bath. Pretty sure a few of my kids still have today's application in their thigh creases and possibly their ears. So white! But it works, I guess that's the point. Good luck getting it off your hands!
customer_reviews.author: katie77t

customer_reviews.title: Easy to rub on your baby
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, love the spray option and it doesn’t have a strong scent. Much easier to rub on than other baby sunscreen brands
customer_reviews.author: KPetros

customer_reviews.title: I love this. We have been using it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. We have been using it for a while on a daily basis. It’s light and easy to spread.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: All of my friends and family envy this spray bottle sunscreen when I pull it out of my beach bag! Amazing coverage
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Del Biondo

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for little ones (and big ones!) Spreads SO nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle olesiak

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen for kids & adults
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Sprays on, blends in quickly, prevents burns. Might not be 100% mineral but you can't have it all in a sunscreen. This is as close as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: katelands

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, goes on easily, but most importantly works great! I've used this on my son since he was 6 months. He's fair skinned do I wanted something that would aggravate. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of sunscreen or even bug spray I will buy to use on my children. I don’t believe since using this product my daughter has ever had a sunburn. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've been happy with this!! I was looking for a spray on natural sunscreen and this one caught my eye. It does take a little extra time to rub it in, but I'd much rather take a few extra minutes vs. putting chemicals on myself and my kids. It kept us from getting burned as well. I did need to reapply on super sunny days or if we were in the water for extended (like more than 3-4 hours) periods of time, but with sunscreen, that's just common sense :)
customer_reviews.author: Bethanna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and not sticky on my own face.
customer_reviews.text: It's the only sunscreen I like putting on my own face because it doesn't feel thick or clog my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunblock for sensitive babies
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this sunblock, just wish it came in a continuous spray :)
customer_reviews.author: jlfriddle2012

customer_reviews.title: My kids have sensitive skin and have no issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids have sensitive skin and have no issues with this sunblock. Works well but need to keep reapplying if you excessively sweat or go in the water.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Both spray bottles broke within 2 days' of use
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of sunscreen spray, but they've got to work on making spray bottles that work. After one broke, we tried the other, which then broke. We tried unclogging nozzles, etc etc to no avail. Too bad, because otherwise, I think the sunscreen works pretty well and I love that it is all-natural.
customer_reviews.author: Bethlyn V Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great light and thin feeling sunblock. My whole family uses it!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Karlin

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that I don't like is that it can leave you feeling slightly greasy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I don't like is that it can leave you feeling slightly greasy. This is our go to sunblock to go swimming in. Smells nice and I love the pump style head.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids with eczema and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin. Only brand that doesn’t flare my sons eczema.
customer_reviews.author: CAL

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of sunscreen and this has been our favorite. Very easy to apply (goes on like a ...
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a lot of sunscreen and this has been our favorite. Very easy to apply (goes on like a spray but covers like a lotion) and protects great. It's not too greasy and doesn't smell too strong.
customer_reviews.author: thriftymom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the spray on is a bit easier to apply, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't leave white streaks like some baby sunblock if you rubbed it into skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well this past summer. Didn't leave white streaks like some baby sunblock if you rubbed it into skin well. I used it to spray on my hand then rub on my kids.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Babyganics sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen for children and adults. Make sure and reapply as directed on bottle and you will be good to go! This is all I use on myself and the grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: PinkRose

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. I like that it is a pump so I can spray it on and the thinner consistency is easier to spread than other mineral sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: DiscoYoga

customer_reviews.title: Love the babyganics brand
customer_reviews.text: I use this every summer and never had an issue with a sunburn or reaction to the product
customer_reviews.author: MelissaAmazon

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small kids
customer_reviews.text: great product! we couldn't find it at our local target in a format we wanted so i hopped onto amazon and sure enough i got double the quantity for the price target had one bottle at.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is easy to use. I just prefer an aerosol spray.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works well difficult to control spray
customer_reviews.text: Works well but spray is difficult to control on small child. Sprays onto other things and difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Punkin

customer_reviews.title: Good spray
customer_reviews.text: I like this spray better than the other aerosol based sprays and lotions. It's easier to spread and you won't waste a single drop.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and has no odor like the regular babyganics sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bin

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a non-toxic easy to rub in sunscreen that I can use on myself and my children!!! It's awesome that it sprays on and rubs in very easily. I have tried many different kinds of sunscreen which either don't have a high enough spf which leaves me applying multiple times or, we are all white and pasty looking because it never rubs in! My baby hates having sunscreen put on so this is nice and quick and only need to apply a couple times if we are planning on being outside all day and I know that we are all good!
customer_reviews.author: Christybee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The spray mechanism clogs easily, which is super annoying. That's more a packaging problem though, the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee overton

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST sunscreen and not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST sunscreen and not just for babies! My kids are 8 and 9 and I still use it. We are outside all summer and they have zero sunburns. It stays on well in and out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brunelle

customer_reviews.title: Caution- awful sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use this sunscreen on your kids. Did full coverage and had our toddler in the sun for less than 2 hours and he got completely fried with a hearty layer. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunblock and a great value to 2 bottles
customer_reviews.text: Favorite sunblock and a great value to 2 bottles. This doesn't leave a sticky residue or rash on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Ok08

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! Non greasy and absorbs easily. Only giving a 4 star rating because it smells strongly of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Spray is much easier to apply when compared to the tube lotion of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not the best application process for babies
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than the normal tube of this brand so that it will spray, but it comes out in a weird stream. Not the best application process for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sun screen. Easy to apply and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sunblock for kiddos! non greasy, works well and natural. love it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to spread and rub in than the cream but works just as well!
customer_reviews.author: katlyn storey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult but I find this sunscreen easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Didn't leave any white cream and work really well!!
customer_reviews.author: sonary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. A little tedious to pump but all in all works effectively
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Only sunscreen I can use on my sons face so he doesn't breakout. Works great
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We spent hours at the beach and my fair skinned little boy didn't get an inch of sunburn, and we only re-applied once! My husband and I used a different brand and were burnt almost immediately. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Babyganics Sunscreen Spray 50 SPF, 6oz, 2 Pack, Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: Style:Sunscreen SprayYour baby’s world just got a little bigger! It’s a big, wide world out there and your baby wants at it. Our SPF 50+ formulas provide broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection and glides on smooth for effortless application. Non-allergenic and tear free, so it can go on whatever part of your baby the sun’s gonna shine.
feature_bullets: REEF SAFE: made without oxybenzone and octinoxate
Formulated without: PABA, phthalates, parabens, fragrances or nano-particles
Formulated with NeoNourish Seed Oil Blend: our own blend of tomato, sunflower, cranberry, black cumin and raspberry seed oils
Perfect for high exposure areas and targeted protection
Broad spectrum SPF 50 - UVA + UVB protection
Formulated with: zinc oxide, octocrylene, octisalate

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
